mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(comment_id, comment_content, comment_product_id, comment_user_id,comment_level) VALUES (#{id},#{content},#{productId},#{userId},#{level})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_like=comment_like+1 WHERE comment_id=#{id}
UPDATE comment SET comment_dislike=comment_dislike+1 WHERE comment_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT user.user_id,user.user_name,user.user_head_img,comment.* FROM comment,user WHERE comment.comment_product_id=#{productId} AND comment.comment_user_id=user.user_id ORDER BY comment.comment_time
